UW researchers are developing an innovative solution based on recycled coffee grounds. Event info Honors and Awards 2024 Fulbright Scholars announced Thirteen UW students and recent alumni were awarded Fulbright U.S. Student Program scholarships this year, joining about 2,000 students and recent graduates from around the country to study and teach abroad.
